enchantment.aileron.smokestack.desc: Sneaking on a campfire will allow you to store up to 3 boosts, which can be used while flying by jumping.
enchantment.aileron.cloudskipper.desc: Flying above the clouds will reduce drag, allowing you to glide faster and farther.
enchantment.yttr.shattering_curse.desc: Block drops will be shattered, akin to if they were reverse-stonecut, 1x1 crafted, or 'uncrafted'.
enchantment.yttr.stabilization.desc: Increases mining speed while in the air.
